Warehouse Management App

DESCRIPTION

The goal of this application is to provide the user with the ability to easily keep track of their inventories and items store in them. This was my first big android application that I tried to implement.

ABSTRACTION

My team and I decided to design the application to be as abstracted as possible. That means that it can be used for managing various types of warehouses. You can store the information of what books you have on your bookshelf, what games you have on your steam account or even what food is currently in your fridge. Every user can define their own type of Warehouse.
